name: Racket (Hoglander)
description:
Racket is a game about playing racket ball but with a twist. If you score, the ball explodes and you lose. The goal of the game is to keep the ball in play as long as possible. Fun with one to two players, or test your luck and play with a bot!

Controls: left and right arrow keys to move and A and D if playing with a friend.

I haven't gotten the game to work without the .pck file, nor do I know how to do that. Unfortunately you will have to download both for the game to work properly.
